muclient.script:
internalrevision = "$Rev$"
dofile (GetPluginInfo (GetPluginID (), 20) .. "luapath.lua")
require "var" require "serialize" require "commas" require "pluginhelper" require "verify" require "tprint" require "ldplugin" require "aarddb"
aarddb = Aarddb:new{}
function planeslookup(mob) return aarddb:planeslookup(mob) end
function cmd_find(cmddict) local mob = cmddict[1] if mob then mobs = planeslookup(mob) phelper:plugin_header('Planes Mobs') if next(mobs) then local tformat = '%-30s %-16s %-5s' ColourNote(RGBColourToName(var.plugin_colour), "black", string.format(tformat, 'Name', 'Pool', 'Pool#')) ColourNote("white", "black", "-----------------------------------------------------------------------") for i,v in ipairs(mobs) do ColourNote(RGBColourToName(var.plugin_colour), "black", string.format(tformat, v['mobname'], v['poollayer'], v['poolnum'])) end else ColourNote(RGBColourToName(var.plugin_colour), "black", 'None') end Note("") end end

phelper:set_default('cmd', 'plookup') phelper:set_default('plugin_colour', 'red')
phelper:add_cmd('find', {func=cmd_find, help="find a planes mob", default=true})
phelper:enable()
